sequence:
A Date With Atago

<size=45>Chapter 4: Rest Break, and then...</size>

scripts.say: Everything on the shopping list is checked off, and we've even had lunch. Wouldn't you say our day has gone pretty smoothly?
*giggles* You look like you're not ready to head back just yet. It's written all over your face. Is there anywhere you'd still like to go?
Didn't I say that you'd be escorting me today? That's going to cost you fifty points.
But that's just talk... to be honest, there is somewhere I'd like to go. You wouldn't mind... following me for a little, would you?
Here, take this ticket. Sorry for making you run around so much today.
After following her around for a while, we amazingly ended up in front of a movie theater...
Ahh, this movie sure brings back memories~ Did you know that your big sister actually likes sappy romance flicks like this one~
Um... I didn't buy the wrong tickets... did I...?
I examined the ticket closely. Printed ominously underneath the title were the words, "GENRE: HORROR"
W-well... I suppose this makes for a nice change in pace. Commander, it's about to start~
As for our seats... here, you can lean against me. If you get scared, you can always hug your big sister nice and tight~
If you absolutely can't handle it anymore, we can leave. After all, I was the one who dragged you here...
You don't have to be stubborn like Takao. If you have something to say, just let your big sister know, okay?
It might have just been my imagination, but Atago's smile looked really, really forced.
